price: Уни булутлардан сизлар ёғдирдингларми ёки Биз ёғдиргувчимизми?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنزَلۡتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُزۡنِ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنزِلُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: a-antum anzaltumūhu mina al-muz'ni am naḥnu al-munzilūna
